author: chirino
msg: - Journal will now check the data files for data corruption if checkForCorruptionOnStartup option is enabled.
- The corrupted journal records can be inspected via DataFile.getCorruptedBlocks()
- An OR and AND BTreeVisitor is now supported to support running more complex queries against the BTree

author: cutting
msg: AVRO-90.  Fix Java's JSON codec to correctly encode unions.

author: joehni
msg: Make class final, since you cannot use its internals anyway.

author: srowen
msg: Better error checking to avoid silent mis-parsing problem mentioned on mahout-user
